book.synopsis: The original CliffsNotes study guides offer expert commentary on major themes, plots, characters, literary devices, and historical background \x97 all to help you gain greater insight into great works you

Electra & Medea, you explore two classic Greek tragedies by Euripides and discover how the playwright introduced many innovations into the drama of his time. Electra and Medea present enlightening psychological examinations of characters under extreme stress \x97 namely the title characters: Electra, the daughter of Agamemnon who seeks revenge on her mother and uncle for murdering her father and forcing her to live in poverty; and Media, who seeks revenge against her husband Jason for betraying her and marrying another woman.
